ing: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, room temperature
des: "This simple recipe can be served as is in a graham crust or you can dress it up with a strawberry or peach glaze.  Either way, a little Cool Whip or whipped cream on top is good."
ins: Mix together the cream cheese, milk and lemon juice. Mix well and spread in graham crust. Chill until set, at least 2 hours, and top as desired.
